oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-03-23 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 23, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Cowboy Copas (host/performer), guest performer Johnny Cash, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Rod Brasfield; Johnny Cash; Del Wood; Cowboy Copas
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Cowboy Copas introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Rod Brasfield) -- Prince Albert commercial (Minnie Pearl, Cowboy Copas) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Cowboy Copas introduces Johnny Cash -- Train Of Love (Johnny Cash) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Del Wood -- Rockin' 88 (Del Wood) -- Cowboy Copas talks -- Filipino Baby (Cowboy Copas) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Cowboy Copas) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Copas, Cowboy; Cash, Johnny
